title: LF Plat+ Smurfs for DynaQ IP Farming
body:
Hey guys,

I am Wohltat - Plat 5 atm and I have a smurf on LV22. In order to farm IP for champs and runes I look for other Plat+ Players that have a smurf and a similar goal. 

My Profile: http://euw.op.gg/summoner/userName=wohltat
My Youtube Channel: http://www.youtube.com/wohltatLOL
My Twitch Stream: http://www.twitch.tv/wohltat


Requirements:
Plat+ Player
Skype, Curse Voice and Teamspeak or willing to install it

What to you
Add "Eloheaven Expat" on your smurf account and post the op.gg link to your main account.

PS: Helped my Buddy xjaky to win his promo to Diamond V: http://euw.op.gg/summoner/userName=xjaky
